popt4jlib.MSSC

Class ClustererTerminationNumIters

  • java.lang.Object
    • popt4jlib.MSSC.ClustererTerminationNumIters
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClustererTerminationIntf

    public class ClustererTerminationNumIters
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClustererTerminationIntf
    specifies that the clustering process will stop after a fixed number of calls to the isDone() method.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java
